title: Resident social lounge, Courtesy patrol, Separate dining area
posting_body: Your search for the perfect new apartment in North Las Vegas is over.
As one of the premier apartment communities, Sedona at Lone Mountain is an ideal place to call home.
Offering spacious one, two and three-bedroom apartments, our pet-friendly community has everything you need for a lavish and comfortable lifestyle.

Ceiling fans in dining room and bedrooms-Vaulted ceilings-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat-Fireplaces available-Courtyard and mountain views-Oversized walk-in closets                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                Featured amenity-Separate dining area-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-Private balcony or patio
Courtesy patrol-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:

Only a small one-time payment-Controlled-entry access with ample parking                                                                                         Featured amenity-Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating-Professional onsite management-Onsite playground-Relaxing resort-style pool                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements-Co-working lounge with complimentary Wi-Fi-Spin classes available
